entry.title: Herbyoga Immunity Booster 5 x 1 Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips
Type: Chai Teas
Price: 7.99

1. Herbyoga - Immunity Booster Desi Kadha Tea
Herbyoga Immunity Boster Desi Kadha Tea is made with selected ingredients like Ashwagandha, Tulsi, Giloy, and many more Indian herbs which help in boosting immunity to the next level. Every way of natural care is a wonder Cure!

Ingredients:- Tulsi, Black Pepper, Clove , Fennel, Turmeric, Giloy, Ashwagandha, Cinnamon
2. Mint Desi Kadha
Herbyoga Mint Desi Kadha made with special Indian herbs, selected from age-old homely remedies. Most ideal for curing several ailments such as cough & cold and also to boost immunity & well-being, The perfect nature care.

Ingredients:- Tulsi, Black Pepper, Clove, Mint Leaf, Fennel, Turmeric, Giloy, Ashwagandha, Cinnamon
3. Herbyoga -Lavender Mint Green Tea
Lavender and mint are the oldest herbs. These have been blended here with fresh anti-oxidant-rich Green Tea, Lavender has a calm and soothing component, and drinking it before bedtime can help alleviate stress, anxiety, and headache Mint too has medicinal properties. it helps boost digestion and keep breath fresh for long.

Ingredients:- Mint leaf, Lavender flower, Green Tea
4.Herbyoga -Tulsi, Turmeric & Ginger Herbal Tea
Turmeric " is an aromatic medicinal plant that is very well known to Indians since ancient times, It is an essential ingredient in many medicines prepared under the Indian medical systems such as Ayurveda, Siddha, and also many ethnic medicinal practices.

Ginger "is a warming spice and it has been used in Asian food for centuries. It has properties to fight infections and keeps the heart-healthy.

Tulsi "(Holy Basil has anti-bacterial properties that help relieve cold.

Ingredients:-Tulsi, Turmeric, Ginger
5.Herbyoga - Tulsi, Turmeric & Lavender Herbal Tea
Our tea Taster produces a very healthy herbal tea with a very old and medicinal, ancient invaluable spice

Turmeric" this condiment has anti-inflammatory properties that help boss immune function and relieve muscle pain.

Tulsi "(Holy Basil) is grown in every Hindu household and people not only consume but also worship it every day to spread positive vibes at Home. the calming effect of Lavender in the body is also thought to boost sleep.

Ingredients:-Tulsi, Turmeric, Lavender

entry.title: Flavoured Tea Sampler Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips
Type: Black Tea
Price: 4.71

1. Mango Black Tea
A refreshing blend of fine black tea from Assam combined with natural extracts of mango. This popular combination is characteristic of a mild aroma, dark Colour in the cup & a fruity flavor of fresh mangoes in every sip.

Visit Product Page

2. Peach Black Tea
A refreshing blend of fine black tea from Assam combined with natural extracts of peach. The tea is characteristic of a delightful aroma, dark Colour in the cup and fruity flavor of ripe peaches.

Visit Product Page

3. Vanilla Black Tea
A refreshing blend of fine black tea from Assam combined with natural extracts of Vanilla. The tea is characteristic of a strong aroma, dark Colour in the cup and smooth undertones of Vanilla.

Visit Product Page


4. Chocolate Black Tea
A refreshing blend of high grow full leaf black tea combined with natural extracts of Chocolate. This bright Colouring tea makes for a robust and flavoury cup.

Visit Product Page

5. Strawberry Black Tea
A refreshing blend of fine black tea from Assam combined with natural extracts of Strawberry. The tea is characteristic of a strong aroma, dark Colour in the cup and smooth undertones of Strawberry.

Visit Product Page

entry.title: Chai Sampler Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips
Type: Chai Teas
Price: 7.44

1.Masala Chai
An age-old classic, Masala Chai, literally meaning 'Spiced Tea' is one of the most popular tea blends in the world, originating from India. This unique and ancient preparation contains a strong flavoury Black Tea blended with a variety of aromatic spices.

Visit Product Page

2.Assam Kadak Chai
A spicy blend of strong CTC tea with handpicked spices to be prepared the traditional way.

Visit Product Page

3.Ginger Mastea
A classic blend of strong CTC tea with a host of selected Indian spices along with the aromatic and pungent Ginger. This traditional recipe makes for an unforgettable drink that is best served in a shot glass or clay cup.

Visit Product Page

4.Saffron Cardamom Exotic Chai
A perfect blend of robust CTC Tea with freshly-crushed Cardamom and aromatic Saffron threads. This special combination makes for a very distinctive and delicious cup. Relax and breathe in the enchanting world of gourmet fine teas with this unique and seductive offering.

Visit Product Page

5.Saffron CTC Black Tea
Black Indian CTC Tea blended with aromatic Saffron threads. This is the most ideal combination to prepare the famed Indian Chai. Best made by mixing with equal ratios of water and milk and thereafter subjecting to 3-4 boils, this is the strong cuppa with an amazing aroma and outstanding taste derived from the combination of Saffron.

entry.title: Green Tea Sampler Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips
Type: Green Tea
Price: 8.35

1.Cardamom Green Tea
A light-Colouring fine Green Tea blended with detoxicant and freshly-crushed green Cardamom which gives an intensely aromatic and resinous fragrance with mildly cool menthol undertones to make for a healthy and delicious brew. 


2. Kashmiri Kahwa
A fine grade of green tea blended with cinnamon sticks and crushed green cardamom. A health beneficial and highly delicious beverage originating from the Kashmir Valley in northern India.

Visit Product Page

3. Cinnamon Green Tea
A light-Colouring fine Green Tea blended with freshly crushed Cinnamon giving this royal tea a sweetish & savoury flavour to make for a healthy and irresistible cup.
4. Cinnamon Cardamom Green Tea
A light-Colouring fine Green Tea blended with freshly crushed Cinnamon and green Cardamom. This perfect combination of fragrant spices makes for a balanced and mildly aromatic taste for this healthy beverage.

Visit Product Page

5. Saffron Kashmiri Kahwa
A fine grade of Green Tea, blended with Cinnamon sticks, crushed green Cardamom and with most desirable and seductive Saffron threads. A health beneficial and highly delicious beverage originating from the Kashmir valley in northern India.

Visit Product Page

6. Lemon Graas Green Tea
A popular herb that smells like lemon yet is milder & sweeter and enriched with several vitamins and minerals and believed to cure various ailments.Green Tea: A fine light-Colouring tea with multiple health benefits.Blended in appropriate ratios to make for a soothing and detoxifying cups.

Visit Product Page

7. Rose Herb Green Tea
A soothing blend of pure green tea and a variety of exotic medicinal herbs from the Himalayas in India. This light and mellow herbal green tea is characteristic of a rich grassy aroma with sweetish and rosy undertones, a smooth flavour with fairly bright Colour in the cup.

Visit Product Page

8. Peach Green Tea - Tin Can
An invigorating combination of premium green tea and the sweet flavour of ripe peaches. This tea is characteristic of a delightful fragrance & fruity flavour with mild Colour in the cup and a soothing aftertaste.

Visit Product Page

9. Earl Grey Green Tea - Tin Can
An Unfermented orthodox Green tea from Darjeeling mildly scented with the natural oil of bergamot. Bergamot fruit is a pear-shaped sour orange originally found in south Italy. This fine & mellow green tea is characteristic of a refreshing & soothing taste, a fruity and fragrant citrus flavor & light Colour in the cup.
10. Lemon Grass Green Tea
Lemon Grass is a popular herb that smells like lemon yet is milder & sweeter and, enriched with several vitamins and minerals, and believed to cure various ailments.

Visit Product Page
